title: An Act establishing a sick leave bank for Greg Pinkerton, an employee of the department of corrections

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Cronin and Ms.Scarsdale of Pepperell, a joint petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No.        ) (subject to Joint Rule 12) of John J. Cronin and Margaret R. Scarsdale for legislation to establish a sick leave bank for Greg Pinkerton, an employee of the department of corrections.  Public Service.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
